Le Luk Condominium is on the same terrain as the Skywalk condominium. Le Luk is the smaller tower of the two although still 27 floors high and the first people moved in at the end of 2011. Le Luk is very conveniently located 2 minutes walking from the Phra Khanong BTS station between Sukhumvit soi 69 and 71. If you have a car you can park your car on 1 of the 5 secured parking decks. Leaving the terrain the security is friendly enough to stop traffic at Sukhumvit Road and within 500 meters you are on the expressway. If you want a taxi just ask security in the lobby to stop one for you and pick you up at the lobby. All residents receive a keycard that gives you access to the floor you live the parking decks and the leisure area on the 6th floor. Here you will find a kids room the library gym sauna and 25 meter infinity pool with Jacuzzi. The pool is surrounded by big square beds which are nicely situated in the shade of the Lelawadee trees. On every floor you have access to Wifi. If you want to have extra facilities like your own internet connection satellite TV or weekly cleaning of your condo just go to the Juristic office at the ground floor. In front of the premises you see a small mall and some retail shops. Behind the building is a small bazar with food stalls.
